project_descr: to quickly respond to emerging needs of the areas which were under ISIL control, this project is an addition to the LADP that supports the short and medium term stabilization and early recovery requirements within the longer term Local Area Development.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
